Issues.SqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE regress_rls_schema.t3_3 (
    id integer NOT NULL,
    c text,
    b text,
    a integer
)
INHERITS (regress_rls_schema.t1_3);

Issues.Reason: Schema contains GIST index which is not supported.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE INDEX grect2ind2 ON am_examples.fast_emp4000 USING gist2 (home_base);

Issues.Reason: Schema contains GIST index which is not supported.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE INDEX grect2ind3 ON am_examples.fast_emp4000 USING gist2 (home_base);

Issues.Reason: Schema contains GIST index which is not supported.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE INDEX hidx ON extension_example.testhstore USING gist (h extension_example.gist_hstore_ops (siglen='32'));

Issues.Reason: Schema contains gin index on multi column which is not supported.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE INDEX gin_idx ON idx_ex.films USING gin (to_tsvector('english'::regconfig, title)) WITH (fastupdate=off);

Issues.Reason: Schema containing VIEW WITH CHECK OPTION is not supported yet.
Issues.SqlStatement:
CREATE VIEW regress_rls_schema.bv1 WITH (security_barrier='true') AS
 SELECT b1.a,
    b1.b
   FROM regress_rls_schema.b1
  WHERE (b1.a > 0)
  WITH CASCADED CHECK OPTION;
